name: Second Coming Of Christ
description:
The Second Coming of Christ is an educational Christian game that has twelve fun levels. It is an interactive way to briefly learn about some of the stories in the bible, and to reveal the victory Jesus, and all who follow him will have in the end.
An Educational Christian Game taking the journey through teachings of the bible. Educate your mind and lift yourself up through this informative game. Enlighten and learn with us and from stories from the bible.
The Levels take you back and teach how the events unfolded and learn from them the right acts. Based on the revelations from the bible. Each revelation enlightens the mind and helps in the learning process.
Second Coming of Christ provides hope and reveals the victory.

Features
-Amazing Graphics and Environment
-12 Interactive Levels
-Easy and Interactive Gameplay
